participant_1.background:
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.
i want to learn how to fly an airplane.
My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.
i like camping and the outdoors in general.
My most prized possession is my running shoes because they have helped me to stay healthy and active throughout the years.

participant_2.background:
I remember feeling safe and loved in my childhood home.
i can t do math.
my beer gut is so huge i have not seen my feet in two years.
I am a student who is trying to stay positive and focus on my studies.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.

content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
My day is going well! I am feeling positive and focused on my studies.
That's great to hear! I am glad you are having a good day. What are you studying?
I am studying math and science. They are both challenging, but I am enjoying them.
Math is definitely challenging! I am not good at it either. What do you want to do with your life after you graduate?
I want to be a teacher. I love working with children and helping them learn.
That's a great goal! I am sure you will be a great teacher.
Thank you! I am excited to start my career.
Me too! I am sure you will do great things.
I like to babysit for the woman who lives next door. I also like to go camping and hiking.
They are! I love being outdoors.
Me too! I wish I could go camping more often.
Maybe we can go camping together sometime!
